'''Pride 2023 Sale''' was an event that took place from August 1, 2023 to an unknown date, celebrating {{Wikipedia|Pride Month}}. It released many pride-related [[Character Creator]] items such as scarves, shirts, and most notably, included the [[Progress Pride Cape]]. All items were free to claim during the time period and created by Minecraft.
